name: Mummyyyyyy
wishText: Hereâ€™s to a fantastic year ahead, full of love, laughter, and endless blessings. Enjoy your special day, Mummy ;)
textInChatBox: How to show mummmy lubbbb on her birthday??
text2:
"Hmmm... How to surprise you now...", I thought.
And then I got it.
text3: I'll surprise you with something simple
text5Content:
You are special!
(And maybe the best mummy ever)
outroText:
Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it.
